name: vsts-developer-tools
description: Visual Studio Team Services Build and Release Tasks for Extensions

scripts.initdev: npm run initdev:npm  && npm run initdev:typings
scripts.prelink:tasks: mkdirp dist/_temp/node_modules && pushd "dist/_temp" && npm install vsts-task-lib && popd
scripts.content:extension:tasks: copyfiles vss-extension.json *.md license.txt tools-icon.png add-task.png dist
scripts.build:tasks: npm run clean && npm run build:tasks:noclean
scripts.build:tasks:noclean: npm run prelink:tasks && npm run compile:tasks && npm run content:tasks && npm run content:extension:tasks  && npm run link:tasks && npm run link:tasks:publish
scripts.package:tasks: tfx extension create --root dist --output-path dist --manifest-globs vss-extension.json

author: Microsoft Corporation
